15static void gui_text_box_draw(Canvas* canvas, WidgetElement* element) {
16 furi_assert(canvas);
17 furi_assert(element);
18 GuiTextBoxModel* model = element->model;
19
20 if(furi_string_size(model->text)) {
21 elements_text_box(
22 canvas,
23 model->x,
24 model->y,
25 model->width,
26 model->height,
27 model->horizontal,
28 model->vertical,
29 furi_string_get_cstr(model->text),
30 model->strip_to_dots);
31 }
32}
33
34static void gui_text_box_free(WidgetElement* gui_string) {
35 furi_assert(gui_string);
36
37 GuiTextBoxModel* model = gui_string->model;
38 furi_string_free(model->text);
39 free(gui_string->model);
40 free(gui_string);
41}
42
43WidgetElement* widget_element_text_box_create(
44 uint8_t x,
45 uint8_t y,
46 uint8_t width,
47 uint8_t height,
48 Align horizontal,
49 Align vertical,
50 const char* text,
51 bool strip_to_dots) {
52 furi_assert(text);
53
54 // Allocate and init model
55 GuiTextBoxModel* model = malloc(sizeof(GuiTextBoxModel));
56 model->x = x;
57 model->y = y;
58 model->width = width;
59 model->height = height;
60 model->horizontal = horizontal;
61 model->vertical = vertical;
62 model->text = furi_string_alloc_set(text);
63 model->strip_to_dots = strip_to_dots;
64
65 // Allocate and init Element
66 WidgetElement* gui_string = malloc(sizeof(WidgetElement));
67 gui_string->parent = NULL;
68 gui_string->input = NULL;
69 gui_string->draw = gui_text_box_draw;
70 gui_string->free = gui_text_box_free;
71 gui_string->model = model;
72
73 return gui_string;
74} //-V773
75
76void widget_element_text_box_set_text(WidgetElement* gui_string, const char* text) {
77 GuiTextBoxModel* model = gui_string->model;
78 furi_string_set(model->text, text);
79}
